text: Læa cng raluk thung khna thi xallxhˌ thrng xea khaman sayya cak brrda phu thi di rab khamphir wa nænxn ying phwk cea ca txng cækcæng khamphir nan hı cæmcæng kæ prachachn thanghlay læa phwk cea ca txng mi pidbang man læw phwk khea k hewiyng man wi beuxnghlang khxng phwk khea læa di lækpeliyn man kab rakha xan leknxy chang lew thæ «sing thi phwk khea lækpeliyn ma
